CHANNEL_TOLERANCE_SLOPE.description: Maximum allowed absolute slope difference between channel boundaries.

CHANNEL_MIN_TOUCHES.description: Minimum pivot touches required on each boundary.

CHANNEL_MIN_VERTICAL_DISTANCE_PCT.description: Minimum vertical separation between channel lines relative to price.

CHANNEL_MIN_DURATION_BARS.description: Minimum number of bars the formation must span.

CHANNEL_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD.description: Minimum RR or confidence score expected from the detector.

SL_ENABLED.description: Toggle for stop-loss placement (kept off by default).

PRICE_TICK_OVERRIDE.description: Optional explicit tick size override for precision troubleshooting.

QTY_STEP_OVERRIDE.description: Optional explicit quantity step override for precision troubleshooting.

MIN_NOTIONAL_BUFFER_PCT.description: Extra percentage buffer applied over the exchange min notional.

TP_STORE_PATH.description: Location of the JSON file used to persist take-profit targets.
